Description: Position Title:             Design Document ControllerEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                        all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:             Dubai, UAEAbout the Client: A well-known restaurant group with unique concepts across Middle EastJob Description: § Establish and enhance document control processes for organized handling and archiving of documents.§ Handle project documents for multiple projects, ensuring proper organization and accessibility.§ Thoroughly review design documents to maintain brand consistency and integrity.§ Develop and manage document templates for future use.§ Prepare progress reports, facilitate communication between teams, and ensure CEO approvals while upholding confidentiality and efficient document retrieval.Skills
Skills: § Bachelor's degree in Architecture or a relevant field preferred.
§ Minimum of 2 years of relevant work experience as a Design Document Controller or office manager role in a design/construction/real estate developer company.
§ Must be familiar with design project management processes, workflow management, and document control tools.
§ Proficiency in MS Office and knowledge of software for Document Management Systems (DMS) is an advantage
